description: A workflow that processes and analyzes data through multiple transformation steps

params.thought: First, I need to validate the input data format from ${context.dataSource}. I'll check for required fields, data types, and any obvious anomalies or errors that would affect processing.
Now I'll clean the data by handling missing values, removing duplicates, and standardizing formats. The validation showed: ${steps.data-validation.thought}

params.explanation: Researching enrichment methods appropriate for this data type

params.thought: Performing feature engineering on the first subset of data. I'll create derived features, normalize values, and transform variables to make them more suitable for analysis.
Performing feature engineering on the second subset of data. This includes different transformations suited to the specific characteristics of this subset.
Enriching the data with additional information based on the research results: ${steps.data-enrichment-research.snippets}
Calculating descriptive statistics for the processed data. This includes measures of central tendency, dispersion, and distribution characteristics.
Performing correlation analysis to identify relationships between variables in the dataset.
Analyzing trends in the data over time or across categories to identify patterns and changes.
Identifying anomalies and outliers in the data that may represent errors, special cases, or points of interest.
Translating data insights into actionable business recommendations. Based on the insights: ${steps.insight-generation.thought}
Planning effective visualizations to communicate the findings. I'll determine the appropriate chart types, layouts, and design elements based on the data characteristics and key messages.
